title: Enterprise truth in action: Apigee API hub fueling powerful Developer Portals
summary: The Apigee API hub and Developer Portals are distinct but interconnected parts of the Apigee platform that help organizations discover and manage APIs for different personas, unlocking API potential and accelerating innovation.
content: The Apigee API hub and Developer Portals are distinct but interconnected parts of the Apigee platform that help organizations discover and manage APIs for different personas, unlocking API potential and accelerating innovation.
